Replace.Text: +2% [ICON_Culture] Culture for each Great Person ever earned, up to +30%.
Gain [ICON_CULTURE] Culture equal to 10% of construction cost when completing buildings.
Unlocks the Builder ability to construct Bateys.
[ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes to City-States provide +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture and +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold for every specialty district in the origin city.
Cities have full [ICON_Housing] Housing from fresh water. Border expansion rate is 25% faster.
Specialty districts on or adjacent to Coast or Lake provide +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture.
Unlocks the Builder ability to construct Moai.
Theater Square districts receive +50% adjacency bonus for every Level of the highest active Alliance.
+1 [ICON_Production] Production on Coast. Extra +1 [ICON_Production] Production after the Industrial era.
+15% [ICON_Production] Production towards wonders.
Bonus resources provide 1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity per type.
Cities receive +2 [ICON_Power] Power for every Harbor district building.
+30% [ICON_Production] Production towards city projects.
Cities receive +1 [ICON_Production] Production for every improved resource type. Extra +1 [ICON_Production] Production after Industrialization Technology.
Regional effects from Industrial Zone, Entertainment Complex, and Water Park districts reach 3 tiles farther.
Cities receive +2 [ICON_Production] Production for each foreign civilization they have [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route to.
Melee and anti-cavalry unit's attacks do full damage to the city's Walls.
Unlocks the Builder ability to construct Alcázars.
Double combat experience when attacking.
Allows purchasing Nihangs with [ICON_Faith] Faith.
Land combat and Support units are 10% cheaper to purchase with [ICON_GOLD] Gold for every Encampment district building.
+2 Loyalty per turn for every Encampment district building. Culture Bomb adjacent tiles when completing Encampment district.
Allows purchasing City Center and Encampment district buildings with [ICON_Faith] Faith. Walls are 50% cheaper to purchase.
Receive [ICON_GreatGeneral] Great General points when land combat unit kills a non-barbarian unit. Receive [ICON_GreatAdmiral] Great Admiral points when naval combat unit kills a non-barbarian unit.
Unlocks the Builder ability to construct Monasteries.
[ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes provide +1 [ICON_FAITH] Faith for each follower in the origin city.
Cities with Holy Site district exert Religious pressure as if they were Holy Cities.
Receive 1 [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] Relic every time you discover new natural wonder. +100% [ICON_Faith] Faith from all [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] Relics.
Unlocks the Builder ability to construct Colossal Heads.
Unlocks the Builder ability to construct Nazca Lines.
Spread 400 Religious pressure when you activate [ICON_GreatPerson] Great Person.
Apostles can choose from any possible promotion.
+2 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science from each [ICON_GreatWork_WRITING] Great Work of Writing. +1 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science from each [ICON_GreatWork_RELIC] Relic and [ICON_GreatWork_Artifact] Artifact.
Districts with building provide +1 [ICON_GreatPerson] Great Person point of their type.
Gain 20 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science per [ICON_Citizen] Population when religious unit converts a city for the first time (on Standard Speed).
+15% [ICON_Science] Science when not at war with any civilization.
Provides 2 of each Strategic resource per turn that you have revealed.
City growth rate is 15% higher in cities with Campus district.
Unlocks the Builder ability to construct Mahaviharas.
+5% [ICON_SCIENCE] Science for each type of improved Strategic resource.
[ICON_TradingPost] Trading Posts in foreign cities provide +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold to [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes.
Unlocks the Builder ability to construct Cahokia Mounds.
[ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes provide +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold for every 5 tiles they travel.
Traders are immune to being plundered.
+1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity in cities with Commercial Hub district.
Unlocks the Builder ability to construct Trading Domes.
[ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes to foreign cities provide +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold for each Luxury resource in the destination city.
Grants [ICON_RESOURCE_CINNAMON] Cinnamon and [ICON_RESOURCE_CLOVES] Cloves Luxury resources, which provide 6 [ICON_Amenities] Amenities each.

[ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes provide +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold for every [ICON_TradingPost] Trading Posts in foreign cities they pass through.

Traders are immune to being plundered.
